entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening then 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
